---
title: "Report from comlandr FRED data pull"
output: html_document
params: 
  isEqual: NA
  rowNum: NA
  newRows: NA
  ggplot: NA
date: "`r Sys.time()`"
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

## Summary

```{r datapull,echo=F,eval=T}
if (params$isEqual) {
  message("FRED data is unchanged")
} else {
  message("FRED data has changed")
  message(paste0("Number of rows in new pull = ",params$rowNum$new))
  message(paste0("Number of rows in current data = ",params$rowNum$old))
  
  if (params$newRows == T) {
    message("The difference is due to an ADDITION of NEW data")
  } else {
    # display plot
    print(params$ggplot)
  }
  
}

```
